definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: wall (Aram. [[שׁוּרָא]], suwro0);—Ge 49:22 (poem in J), 2Sa 22:30 = Ps 18:30; pl. sf. [[שׁוּרׂתָם]] Job 24:11 their walls De Di De, cf. Bu; but v. [[שׁוּרָה]] infra; [[שָׁרוֹתֶיהָ]] Je 5:10 = its walls, acc. to Vrss AV RV Gf Gie, read then ´[[שֻׁ]]:, but v. id.
